lead_paragraph: A rare full day off turned out to be just what the Pittsburgh Pirates needed to keep Jeff Locke's winning streak going.

headline.print_headline: Locke Wins Third Straight, Pirates Rally to Beat A's 7-3
headline.main: Locke Wins Third Straight, Pirates Rally to Beat A's 7-3

snippet: A rare full day off turned out to be just what the Pittsburgh Pirates needed to keep Jeff Locke's winning streak going....
